synopsis.text:
Haruaki Yachi, a high school student with an unusual resistance to curses, finds his ordinary life turned upside down when his father sends him a mysterious black cube. Unbeknownst to him, the cube is a cursed instrument known as a 'Worse'. One night, he stumbles upon a silver-haired girl named Fear, who is the human manifestation of the cube and an instrument of torture.

Fear, with her sassy demeanor and a knack for causing trouble, is far from your average girl. She possesses deadly powers and a homicidal past, making her a target for dangerous forces. Despite this, Haruaki is determined to help Fear break her curse and adapt to the human world.

Together with other cursed comrades, Haruaki and Fear engage in thrilling battles against other Worse instruments and their owners. Utilizing Fear's 32 torture mechanisms, they strive to overcome the challenges that come their way.

Based on the light novel series by Minase Hazuki, this anime is a blend of love, action, and comedy. It follows the journey of Haruaki and Fear as they navigate through life's trials, all while trying to keep Fear's identity under wraps. Will they succeed in breaking Fear's curse, or will the dangerous forces prevail? Dive into the world of C3 to find out!
